Description: Extract specific entities (e.g., names, dates) from text
Identify parts of speech (e.g., nouns, verbs) in text
Determine sentiment (e.g., positive, negative) of text
Identify underlying topics in large text datasets
Classify text into predefined categories (e.g., functional/non-functional requirements)
Extract specific information (e.g., requirements, constraints) from text
Identify relationships between pronouns and their referents
Summarize large text datasets into concise summaries
Extract system requirements from natural language text
Prioritize system requirements based on stakeholder feedback
Validate system requirements against stakeholder needs
Generate user stories from system requirements
Generate acceptance criteria for user stories
